snippet.title: Within Deep Sorrows Teaser
snippet.description:
An Indi game called Within Deep Sorrows is being developed by an very small indi company called Octagram. Only two members contributed towards the developing outcome, yet two other members will also be contributing when finalized. 


Visit:  http://gamejolt.com/games/other/within-deep-sorrows/16216/  to keep updated, and to download on release date !!


** RELEASE DATE **  ----  30/12/13


Octagram Members:

Bill Wheate - Founder: Game design and development 
Charlie Wheate - Co - Founder: Game Design
Ryan Gleed: Graphic Design 
Ian Clements: Animation
